mapper.select: select * from shop where shopaddress = #{address} Limit 1;
mapper.insert: insert into shop(shopname, shopaddress, owneridx ,shoptel, shopwebsite, imagefilename, promotionText, registrationDate, longitude, latitude) values( #{shopName}, #{shopAddress}, #{ownerIdx},#{shopTel}, #{shopWebsite}, #{imageFilename}, #{promotionText}, DATE(NOW()), #{longitude}, #{latitude});
mapper.select: select shopidx from shop where shopname = #{shopName} and shopaddress = #{shopAddress};
select distinct s.* from shop s inner join item i ON s.shopidx = i.shopidx where i.endtime >= now();
mapper.update: update shop set shopname = #{shopName}, shopaddress = #{shopAddress}, owneridx = #{ownerIdx}, shoptel = #{shopTel}, shopwebsite = #{shopWebsite}, imagefilename = #{imageFilename}, promotionText = #{promotionText} , latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} where shopidx = #{shopidx}
mapper.select: select * from shop where shopidx in ( select distinct shopidx from item where salecost <= #{maxPrice} and salecost >= #{minPrice} and endtime >= now() );
select distinct s.* from shop s join item i on s.shopidx = i.shopidx where #{rating} <= s.rating and i.endtime >= now();
mapper.update: update shop set rating = #{rating} where shopidx = #{shopidx};
mapper.select: select r.reservationidx, m.memberidx, m.name, m.phone, m.trust, r.number, r.confirm, r.itemidx from member as m left join reservation as r on m.memberidx = r.memberidx where r.itemidx = #{itemidx};
